name: Polygon Parkour
description:
My First game in a new engine slowly making my dream of becoming a game dev is slowly coming true there will be more levels soon there's only 3 levels and they show a dash to show you how hard they are 1 being easy while 5 meaning hard 

there is a customization option and I will be adding more outfits soon

please give me feed back if there's any bugs or anything you want me to add

I am  a one man team
